content: this hat pattern was available again in a compilation magazine crochet today baby & kids book spring 2012 smaller hook for baby hat larger hook for toddler hat sizes are baby 3-6 months toddler 1-3 years **gauge ** - with smaller hook g/6 4 0mm rounds 1-5 = 4-1/2 /11 5cm diameter - with larger hook h/8 5 0mm rounds 1-5 = 5-3/4 /14 5cm diameter other notions needed - yarn needle - small pom pom maker en español 1 1 http //www redheart mx/instrucciones-gratis/beb%c3%a9-pomp%c3%b3n
